p: Table 7 shows the cytotoxic activity (IC 50) of the EO, ME+EO, and ME against HaCat cells. The EO showed lower cytotoxicity than ME+EO and ME. Koba et al 68(2009) compared the cytotoxicity of EOs from the genus Cymbopogon ( C. nardus and C. citratus) against HaCat cells and showed that the C. nardus EO had lower cytotoxicity than the C. citratus EO, with IC 50 values of 450 µL/mL and 150 µL/mL, respectively.
